about_the_game:
Sky Trader is an immersive flight simulator where you take command of your very own airship and trading company. Set on a mist-covered planet, you’ll navigate a world full of danger as you pilot your way to wealth and prestige.

Key Features:


  • Immersive First-Person Gameplay: Experience the thrill of piloting your airship from a first-person perspective. As children, who hasn't looked at a complex control panel and secretly (or not secretly) wanted to push buttons and flip switches. For some of us, that feeling never goes away! Scratch that itch with Sky Trader!
  • No Wasted Knobs: If you see it, you can turn/switch/adjust it. Nothing is just for show, and everything has a purpose of some kind.
  • Customizable Airships: Upgrade and modify your vessel with installable and removable parts to suit your trading and combat needs. All the parts you install can be wired back and controlled from your own airship bridge. You can even install and remove new instruments and panels on the bridge itself. Experience the thrill of a brand new upgrade!
  • Realistic Physics: Airship flight characteristics are detailed and realistically simulated.
  • Detailed Systems Simulation: Manage every aspect of your airship’s operations, from electrical and fuel systems to hydraulics. Everything is simulated and is physically accurate.
  • Dynamic Weather and Atmospheric Conditions: Navigate through challenging weather scenarios, paying close attention to environmental factors such as wind and precipitation. If you allow ice to accumulate on your ship, your speed decreases and weight increases. Ice is bad...
  • Sweet Retro-Futurism: Sky Trader captures a dieselpunk asthetic, seamlessly combining a dreamy Studio Ghibli inspired world with retro-futuristic airships.

Become the Ultimate Sky Trader:


Forge your empire above the treacherous mists, transporting cargo for profit. Be ever vigilant as your wealth grows; there are those who would take your valuable cargo by any means necessary. Your airship is your home, and you must do everything in your power to protect it!

Master the Skies, Build Your Empire, and Unravel Mysteries Above the Mist in Sky Trader.

short_description: Pilot your own airship and take control of every detail in this dynamic simulation. Haul cargo across the dangerous mist as you earn cash for provisions and upgrades. Explore the mist-islands as you fly several playable airships. Master the Skies and Build Your Empire with Sky Trader.
